meanings.sent1: The path through the rockiest terrain was challenging.
meanings.sent2: The mountain was covered in the rockiest terrain I had ever seen.
meanings.sent3: Trying to walk on the rockiest path felt like a never-ending game of hopscotch.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were as rocky as the rockiest road in the countryside.
meanings.sent5: The rockiest landscape resembled a giant pile of boulders waiting to be climbed.

meanings.definition: Most unstable or difficult to navigate
meanings.sent1: The boat struggled to stay afloat in the rockiest waters.
meanings.sent2: The rockiest part of the journey was crossing the narrow bridge.
meanings.sent3: Balancing on one foot felt as unstable as walking on the rockiest ground.
meanings.sent4: Their relationship was on the rockiest ground after the argument.
meanings.sent5: Navigating through the rockiest terrain required utmost concentration and skill.

meanings.definition: Showing the most variation or inconsistency
meanings.sent1: Her mood swings were the rockiest among all her friends.
meanings.sent2: The rockiest part of the project was dealing with conflicting opinions.
meanings.sent3: The weather forecast was as rocky as the rockiest rollercoaster ride.
meanings.sent4: Navigating through the rockiest decisions required careful consideration.
meanings.sent5: The rockiest path to success is often filled with unexpected twists and turns.
